text: aistathnaa allah min alshera' alshera' aladhin ahtdawa bial'iiman waeamiluu alsalhat, wakthru min dhikr allah faqaluu alshier fi tawhid allah - sbhanh- walthna' ealayh jll dhkrh, waldifae ean rasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, wtklmu bialhikmat walmaweizat waladab alhsnt, wantasaruu ll'islam, yhjwn man yhjwh 'aw yhjw rswlh, rddana ealaa alshueara' alkafryn. wasayaelam aladhin zalamuu 'anfusahum balshrk walmeasy, wazalamuu ghyrhm bghmt hqwqhm, 'aw alaietida' elyhm, 'aw balttuhm albatlt, 'aya marjie min marajie alsharu walhlak yurjaeun 'ilyh?
